cs475

Class CommandLineUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs475.CommandLineUtilities

  • public class CommandLineUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utilities for wrapping the Apache Jakarta CLI for command line parsing.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • initCommandLineParameters

        public static void initCommandLineParameters(java.lang.String[] args,
                                             java.util.LinkedList<org.apache.commons.cli.Option> specified_options,
                                             java.lang.String[] manditory_args)
        This uses the apache Jakarta CLI to parse the command line. A single static instance of this class exists for global access by all parts of the program. To use this class, a list of options must be specified and passed to this method. Mandatory arguments should be encoded as strings.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line received by main
        manditory_args - A list of strings that contain the names of mandatory arguments.
        specified_options - A list of options to use for this program.

      • hasArg

        public static java.lang.String[] getOptionValues(java.lang.String option)
        This method is used when there is one argument for the option presented as a ";" separated list.
